io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.content

Class RecordsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.content.RecordsResource

  • @Path(value="/records")
public class RecordsResource
extends Object
    Resource for JSON datasets containing records that match the given query, range, etc. Replaces WebApiServlet.
